attributes.action: make andrew connor a knight of the realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: andrew connot of 70 willesden lane london nw6 7sx, should be made a knight of the realm, he is a common person but there should be more comon every day people honoured for no reason at all except that they are normal and live the life as set out by the government, this in itself being an achievement.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
